name: innermost
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: innermost
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: This was the diary in which Gina recorded her innermost thoughts and secrets.
example.egtrans: 这是吉娜记载内心深处思想和秘密的那本日记。

dsense.name: innermost
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: The spacecraft will fly through the innermost rings of Saturn.
example.egtrans: 宇宙飞船将穿越土星最内侧的光环。
